text: In order to send UDRs to their respective tables in Data Veracity, Data Veracity Forwarding agent must be used in a batch workflow and the invalid UDRs have to be routed to it. It is recommended to use a preceding Analysis (or Aggregation) agent to associate an Error Code with the UDR. Note! From the Data Veracity Forwarding agent, it is possible to pass on MIM values to be associated with the UDRs in the Data Veracity Search UI. Open An example workflow forwarding UDRs to the Data Veracity tables as defined by the Data Veracity profile This section contains the following subsections: Data Veracity Forwarding Agent Configuration Data Veracity Forwarding Agent Events Data Veracity Forwarding Agent Input/Output Data and MIM Data Veracity Forwarding Agent Transaction Behavior Data Veracity Forwarding Example
title: Data Veracity Forwarding Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
